price: 68. Celui à qui Nous donnons longue vie, Nous vouons sa création à la décrépitude. N’entendent-ils donc pas raison ?
arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِۚ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waman nuʿammir'hu nunakkis'hu fī al-khalqi afalā yaʿqilūna
